verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This life I have, The world didn't give it to me.
This life I have, The world didn't give it to me.
This life I have, The world didn't give it to me.
The world didn't give it and the world can't take it away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This hope I have, etc.
This brother I have, etc.
This sister I have, etc.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
La vida que yo tengo
El mundo no me la dio (3x)
No me la dio y no me la puede quitar.
